General.Name: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited manufactures and distributes plastic lens and related products in Thailand. It operates in two segments, Plastic and Glass Lens; and Other Products and Services. The Plastic and Glass Lens segment produces and sells optical lenses. It offers mineral and prescription lenses. The Other Products and Services segment is involved in the sale of glass molds; trade of goods purchased for resale; glasses assembly services; and surface treatment of hard coatings, as well as anti-reflection coating services for organic lenses. It exports its products to Europe, Australia, New Zealand, Asia and Pacific, the United States, Africa, and the Middle East. The company was formerly known as Thai Polymer Lens Company Limited and changed its name to Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited in 2004. Thai Optical Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Bang Bua Thong, Thailand.
General.Address: 15/5 Moo 6 Bangbuathong-Suphanburi Road, Bang Bua Thong, Thailand, 11110
